statements: SELECT * FROM sensor_components;
SELECT component_name, manufacturer_name FROM sensor_components ORDER BY manufacturer_name ASC;
SELECT component_id, component_name, production_date FROM sensor_components WHERE production_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT component_name, component_type, calibration_date FROM sensor_components ORDER BY calibration_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM sensor_components WHERE component_type = 'Temperature Sensor';
SELECT component_id, component_name, component_type FROM sensor_components WHERE manufacturer_name = 'ABC Corp' ORDER BY production_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM sensor_components WHERE component_type = 'Temperature Sensor' AND calibration_date <= '2022-01-01';
SELECT component_id, component_name, manufacturer_name FROM sensor_components ORDER BY manufacturer_name ASC, component_id DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT component_type FROM sensor_components WHERE production_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2022-01-01' ORDER BY component_type ASC;

SELECT component_id, component_name, calibration_date FROM sensor_components WHERE production_date > '2020-01-01' AND manufacturer_name IN ('XYZ Corp', 'PQR Ltd') ORDER BY manufacturer_name DESC, calibration_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM quantum_sensor_components;
SELECT component_name, component_type, manufacturer FROM quantum_sensor_components ORDER BY component_type ASC;
SELECT component_id, component_name FROM quantum_sensor_components WHERE manufacturer = 'IBM';
SELECT reading_id, reading_value, reading_time FROM sensor_readings ORDER BY reading_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM sensor_readings WHERE reading_value > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM quantum_sensor_components WHERE component_type = 'Sensor';
SELECT component_id, component_name FROM quantum_sensor_components ORDER BY component_id DESC;
SELECT component_id, component_name, release_date FROM quantum_sensor_components WHERE manufacturer = 'Quantum Technologies' AND release_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM sensor_readings WHERE reading_time BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2022-01-01';

SELECT component_name, reading_value, reading_time FROM quantum_sensor_components JOIN sensor_readings ON quantum_sensor_components.component_id = sensor_readings.component_id ORDER BY reading_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM quantum_sensors;
SELECT sensor_name, manufacturer, purchase_date FROM quantum_sensors;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_type FROM quantum_sensors WHERE purchase_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT component_id, component_name FROM sensor_components ORDER BY component_id DESC;
SELECT reading_id, timestamp, value FROM sensor_readings WHERE value > 100 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM quantum_sensors ORDER BY sensor_name DESC;
SELECT sensor_name, sensor_type FROM quantum_sensors WHERE manufacturer = 'IBM';
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name, sensor_type FROM quantum_sensors WHERE purchase_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name, component_name, component_type FROM quantum_sensors JOIN sensor_components ON quantum_sensors.sensor_id = sensor_components.component_id;
SELECT sensor_id, COUNT(*) AS readings_count FROM sensor_readings GROUP BY sensor_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 100;
SELECT * FROM QuantumSensorComponents;
SELECT component_name, manufacturer FROM QuantumSensorComponents WHERE component_id = 1;
SELECT type_name, sensor_class FROM SensorTypes ORDER BY type_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM SensorReadings WHERE reading_timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT location_name, location_address FROM SensorLocations ORDER BY location_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM QuantumSensorComponents WHERE manufacturer = 'ABC Corp'
SELECT component_name, release_date FROM QuantumSensorComponents ORDER BY release_date DESC
SELECT * FROM SensorTypes WHERE sensor_class = 'Quantum' AND type_name LIKE 'G%'
SELECT component_name, manufacturer FROM QuantumSensorComponents INNER JOIN SensorReadings ON QuantumSensorComponents.component_id = SensorReadings.component_id
SELECT * FROM SensorLocations ORDER BY location_name
SELECT * FROM Quantum_Sensor_Components;
SELECT component_name, manufacturer, price FROM Quantum_Sensor_Components WHERE quantity > 100;
SELECT category_name FROM Sensor_Categories ORDER BY category_name DESC;
SELECT username, email FROM Sensor_Users WHERE username LIKE 'A%' AND email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT * FROM Sensor_Orders WHERE status = 'Pending' ORDER BY order_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Quantum_Sensor_Components WHERE price > 1000 ORDER BY component_name DESC;
SELECT component_name, manufacturer, component_type, price FROM Quantum_Sensor_Components WHERE quantity > 10 AND manufacturer = 'ABC Corp';
SELECT c.component_name, i.quantity, i.location FROM Quantum_Sensor_Components c JOIN Sensor_Inventory i ON c.component_id = i.component_id WHERE i.quantity < 5;

SELECT u.username, o.order_date, i.location FROM Sensor_Users u JOIN Sensor_Orders o ON u.user_id = o.user_id JOIN Sensor_Inventory i ON o.inventory_id = i.inventory_id WHERE o.status = 'Delivered' ORDER BY o.order_date DESC;

SELECT c.component_name, c.price, SUM(i.quantity) AS total_quantity FROM Quantum_Sensor_Components c JOIN Sensor_Inventory i ON c.component_id = i.component_id GROUP BY c.component_name, c.price ORDER BY total_quantity DESC;
